text: Joysound Dive (Japanese: ジョイサウンドダイブ, Hepburn: Joisaundo daibu) was a PlayStation 3 video game developed by XING and published by Bandai Namco Games, exclusively released in Japan on November 23, 2011. It was region locked, with no plans for an international release, being one of only three PlayStation 3 games to enforce region locking (the other two being Persona 4 Arena and Way of the Samurai 3).https://kotaku.com/5980773/joysound-dive- turns-your-ps3-into-a-90000-song-karaoke-machine It was shut down and removed from the PlayStation Store on October 31, 2014. ==References== Category:2011 video games Category:PlayStation 3 games Category:PlayStation 3-only games Category:PlayStation Network games Category:Sony Interactive Entertainment games Category:Video games developed in Japan Category:Region-locked PlayStation 3 games Category:Japan-exclusive video games
title: Joysound Dive
